plugin.name: jsi18n
plugin.author: Kushal Likhi
plugin.title: Jsi18n Plugin
plugin.description: This plugin aids and provide a very DRY and intuitive way to do internationalization for JavaScript files. This plugin is high in runtime performance. It is also CDN/static resource caching friendly, hence could give a faster end user experience. This plugin also supports auto reloading of JSi18n properties in the development enviornment just like any other artifact.
